nodes.text: Tvinnii Blackrunn was a member of the Black Sun crime cartel who lived during the Galactic Civil War. By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the Black Sun formed an alliance with the Detritus Satellites, a group of Vulture-class droids active in the Dantooine system. Blackrunn and the droid X10-700 "Destroyer" were the signers of the alliance agreement.

In the space part of Star Wars Galaxies, rare information storage devices can sometimes be looted from destroyed starfighters. One of these datapads, named "An Alliance Agreement," can be found in the Dantooine system and contains the text of an agreement signed by Blackrunn.
